title: Technology-Integrated Interdisciplinary Lesson Design for Elementary Teacher Candidates

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of elementary education curriculum and basic technical skills
context.additional_context: Learner roles: pre-service teachers (job seekers), BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment, project-based assessment applied

learning_goals: Learners can select and utilize three or more internet-based technologies/apps/interactive whiteboards suitable for interdisciplinary lesson design.
Learners can distinguish and apply two or more activity elements that trigger lower- and higher-order thinking skills when designing technology-integrated lessons.
Design an interdisciplinary lesson plan (3 sessions) centered on language domains as a 2-person team project and specify technology integration strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
